doc.previous: After teaching in Houston Johnson entered politics in 1930 he campaigned for Texas State Senator Welly Hopkins in his run for Congress Hopkins recommended him to Congressman Richard M Kleberg who made Johnson his legislative secretary Johnson was elected speaker of the Little Congress a group of Congressional aides where he cultivated Congressmen newspapermen and lobbyists Johnson s friends soon included aides to President Franklin D Roosevelt as well as fellow Texans such as Vice President John Nance Garner He also became a surrogate son to Sam Rayburn
doc.after: Johnson married Claudia Alta Taylor also known as Lady Bird of Karnack Texas on November 17 1934 after he attended Georgetown University Law Center for several months They had two daughters Lynda Bird born in 1944 and Luci Baines born in 1947 Johnson had a practice of giving people and animals names with his and his wife s initials as he did with his daughters and with his dog Little Beagle Johnson 19
